授業方法:
HyFlex (Hybrid Flexible) session. However, depending on the public health concerns, there is a possibility of changing to Online Format: Simultaneous and Two-way. Students are expected to participate the first session of the course　so that we can discuss the format and contents for this course.
Please refer to LUNA 3 days before the first session, check class announcements and review a more detailed version of syllabus.
We will use LUNA for exchange of documents, and students are expected to submit assignments via LUNA.

トピック.授業外学習2: Please refer to LUNA regularly, check class announcements and review your learning materials as instructed. Students will be expected to read and write extensively, and to prepare thoroughly for class.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）
